titles.title: Look what You've done in my life,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Look what You've done in my life,
See what You've done in this heart,
You've brought hope, healing and freedom,
Look what You've done in my life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And though I'm not deserving of Your love
You give it all to me
With open arms You welcome me.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Sets me free, sets me free, sets me free
It's Your love that sets me free.
